name: Oasis Transfer
description:
Welcome to The Oasis

Oasis Transfer is a fast-paced, first-person fighting game set in a dystopian cybernetic future. Travel through Earths last resort of survival, The Oasis, and discover the secrets behind humanities downfall.

The Oasis

After Earth's downfall, humanity was shoved into 'Oasis bubbles' in order to save the last of the population. With the world now plagued with corruption and greed, humans have gone to the extremes with cybernetic enhancements, sometimes going too far...

Battle waves of cyber-enhanced enemies with your cybernetic gauntlets in order save the Oasis and discover the truth to save humanity.

The Team:
  • Lowenna Whitehead - Programmer
  • Luke Urquhart - Programmer
  • Will Bourne - Programmer
  • Lauren Buj-Wynne - Music and audio designer
  • Taylor Gibbons - Animator
  • Juliette Stevens - Character and environment artist
  • Goo Wade - Environment artist
  • Laura Bullimore - Concept artist
  • Alfie Cope - Environment artist
  • Ethan Fox - Designer
  • Ben Rawlings - Designer
Feel free to leave any project feedback in the comments, anything and everything is useful!
